A4.text: Egypt is considered as 'being the place of origin of the potter's wheel.

A5.text: Many modern scholars suggest that the first potter's wheel was first developed by the ancient Sumerians in Mesopotamia.

A6.text: Earliest potter's wheel dated to the middle of the 5th millennium BC from the Cucuteniâ€“Trypillia culture in western Ukraine.

A7.text: The invention of the potter's wheel in Mesopotamia sometime between 6,000 and 4,000 BC (Ubaid period) revolutionised pottery production.
